seadatanet.name: International Coastal Atlas Network Coastal Erosion Global Thesaurus
seadatanet.description: Terms used at all hierarchical levels in the ICAN global thesaurus for coastal erosion.  Terms used to populate drop-down lists in discovery portals.

seadatanet.name: Oregon Coastal Atlas Coastal Erosion Thesaurus markup terms
seadatanet.description: Terms used at all hierarchical levels in the Oregon Coastal Atlas for coastal erosion layers, datasets and discovery.

seadatanet.name: Oregon Coastal Atlas Coastal Erosion Thesaurus discovery terms
seadatanet.description: Terms used at all hierarchical levels in the Oregon Coastal Atlas for categorisation and discovery, but not for layer or dataset markup.

seadatanet.name: MIDA Coastal Erosion Thesaurus
seadatanet.description: A collection of terms used by the Irish Marine Data Atlas in association with the topic of coastal erosion

seadatanet.name: AtlantOS Essential Variables
seadatanet.description: Collection of terms used to group key measurements into a set of Essential Variables (EV) and their associated units as part of the AtlantOS Atlantic Ocean dataset

seadatanet.name: BODC-annotated certified reference materials
seadatanet.description: Internationally registered materials used to assess the accuracy of analyses and for laboratory intercomparability studies with unique identifiers assigned by BODC.

seadatanet.name: BODC-annotated reference material classifiers
seadatanet.description: Terms used to classify the type of reference material used by laboratories in the verification of analytical techniques in terms of consistency, accuracy and precision

seadatanet.name: BODC people titles
seadatanet.description: Terms used to populate the title field in the BODC address book.

seadatanet.name: BODC governance roles
seadatanet.description: Terms used by BODC to describe roles that may be given to people within a governance structure.

seadatanet.name: BODC data and metadata integrity checks
seadatanet.description: Terms describing automated integrity checks applied to data and metadata during BODC quality control.

seadatanet.name: Sampling net gear deployment vocabulary
seadatanet.description: A catalogue of deployment methods of sampling net gears for the collection of mainly plankton, micronekton, and neuston organisms based on Wiebe P.H. et al. (2014)

seadatanet.name: Celtic Seas Partnership data owner nations bordering MSFD Celtic Seas Marine Region
seadatanet.description: Terms used to describe single and multiple nations who own datasets (and are part of the Celtic Seas Partnership) bounding the Celtic Seas Marine Region as designated by the Marine Strategy Framework Directive (MSFD)

seadatanet.name: BODC Standard Operating Procedures and Protocols for environmental observations
seadatanet.description: Procedures or protocols that have been adopted by communities to ensure consistent and comparable methods are used when making observations from the environment. This also includes derivation and quality assurance practices.

seadatanet.name: BODC measurement numeric attribute types
seadatanet.description: Terms used by BODC to define measurement attributes described by numbers associated with data held in its repositories.

seadatanet.name: Celtic Seas Partnership stakeholder sectors
seadatanet.description: Terms used by the Celtic Seas Partnership to categorise stakeholders according to the marine areas within which they operate.

seadatanet.name: Celtic Seas Partnership scale
seadatanet.description: Terms used by the Celtic Seas Partnership to broadly describe the spatial area of influence of a project, programme or initiative.

seadatanet.name: Celtic Seas Partnership governance mechanisms
seadatanet.description: Terms used by the Celtic Seas Partnership to describe the transboundary nature of a project, programme or initiative.

seadatanet.name: NMF-SS Research Vessel underway variable NetCDF vocabulary
seadatanet.description: Names of variables recorded into NetCDF files by the underway monitoring system on National Marine Facilities Sea Systems (NMF-SS) research vessels such as the RRS James Cook and RRS Discovery. Variables are from meteorological, hydrographic and navigational instruments.

seadatanet.name: BODC Organisations
seadatanet.description: Up-to-date names and addresses for organisational entities referenced in BODC systems.

seadatanet.name: BODC Platform Models
seadatanet.description: Terms used to describe designs or versions of platforms.

seadatanet.name: BODC Seafloor Depth Data Sources
seadatanet.description: Terms used to describe the provenance of a water depth included in BODC metadata

seadatanet.name: BODC series feature types
seadatanet.description: Terms that describe groups of BODC series with common independent variable characteristics.

seadatanet.name: SeaDataNet sea areas
seadatanet.description: Sea area terms from the IHB(1953) list plus additional terms added under SeaDataNet governance.

seadatanet.name: ICES Platform Codes
seadatanet.description: Identifiers and metadata for platform instances (combinations of names and physical entities such as hulls or airframes).

seadatanet.name: Intergovernmental Oceanographic Commission countries
seadatanet.description: Country names published by ICES on behalf of IOC as part of their RNODC (formats) responsibility.  Maintained until 2003.

seadatanet.name: SeaVoX salt and fresh water body gazetteer
seadatanet.description: Terms specified by the SeaVoX vocabulary governance to describe coherent regions of the hydrosphere. Includes land masses enclosing freshwater bodies.

seadatanet.name: Active vocabulary content governance authorities
seadatanet.description: Bodies responsible for the intellectual control of vocabularies served by the NDG/SeaDataNet vocabulary server.

seadatanet.name: World Meteorological Organisation voluntary observing ship category
seadatanet.description: WMO ship type codes used to classify voluntary observing ships. Source: [WMO No.47 - International List of Selected, Supplementary and Auxiliary Ships](http://www.wmo.int/pages/prog/www/ois/pub47/pub47-home.htm).

seadatanet.name: International Standards Organisation countries
seadatanet.description: ISO country codes from ISO3166-1 and ISO3166-3 lists taken from www.iso.org on 16/08/2011 plus OGC terms for missing values and the ISO 3166 Maintenance Agency (ISO3166/MA) Exceptionally Reserved code for the European Union.

seadatanet.name: NERC DataGrid data production tool category
seadatanet.description: Abbreviated terms used to specify categories of data production tools in the NERC DataGrid MOLES metadata schema.

seadatanet.name: Activity purpose categories
seadatanet.description: Terms used to specify why an activity was undertaken.

seadatanet.name: European Nature Information System Level 3 Habitats
seadatanet.description: Medium-granularity (hierarchical level 3 of 5) terms  describing the environment associated with an activity from a biological perspective.

seadatanet.name: Monitoring activity legislative drivers
seadatanet.description: Legislative acts, agreements and treaties that have provided the impetus for monitoring activities to be undertaken.

seadatanet.name: Ten-degree Marsden Squares
seadatanet.description: Labels applied to areas of ten degrees latitude by ten degrees longitude in the Marsden Square system.

seadatanet.name: SeaDataNet Ports Gazetteer
seadatanet.description: Names of a geographic location at which a cruise may begin or end. Used by SeaDataNet to populate Cruise Summary Report metadata.

seadatanet.name: World Meteorological Organisation sea states
seadatanet.description: Codes and terms developed from the Douglas wind sea states to describe the general condition of the surface of a large water body.

seadatanet.name: Bonn Agreement pollution report accuracy
seadatanet.description: Terms used to classify the accuracy and reliablity of pollution reports filed under the Bonn Agreement.

seadatanet.name: BODC marine pollution sources
seadatanet.description: Terms developed by BODC to provide a standard classification of pollution sources to be used in UK pollution reports filed under the Bonn Agreement.

seadatanet.name: BODC oilspill quantity
seadatanet.description: Terms developed by BODC to classify the magnitude of a discharge of oil into the marine environment

seadatanet.name: Marine Strategy Framework Directive descriptors 2010/477/EU
seadatanet.description: Concepts specified as descriptors of good environmental status as defined by the Marine Strategy Framework Directive as published in 2010/477/EU: Commission Decision of 1 September 2010 on criteria and methodological standards on good environmental status of marine waters (notified under document C(2010) 5956).

seadatanet.name: Marine Strategy Framework Directive criteria 2010/477/EU
seadatanet.description: Concepts specified as criteria to be used to measure good environmental status as defined by the Marine Strategy Framework Directive as published in 2010/477/EU: Commission Decision of 1 September 2010 on criteria and methodological standards on good environmental status of marine waters (notified under document C(2010) 5956).

seadatanet.name: Marine Strategy Framework Directive indicators 2010/477/EU
seadatanet.description: Concepts specified as indicators to be used to measure good environmental status as defined by the Marine Strategy Framework Directive as published in 2010/477/EU: Commission Decision of 1 September 2010 on criteria and methodological standards on good environmental status of marine waters (notified under document C(2010) 5956).

seadatanet.name: MEDIN Data Guidelines
seadatanet.description: Documents produced by the Marine Environmental Data and Information Network specifying information content standards for the collection of specific types of marine data

seadatanet.name: BODC organisation roles within activities and projects
seadatanet.description: Generic terms used by BODC to describe the relationship between organisations and projects or data collection activities such as cruises

seadatanet.name: NERC DataGrid vocabulary term relationships
seadatanet.description: Terms used in the NDG project to describe the relationship between subjects and objects in RDF triples, including vocabulary term mappings.

seadatanet.name: BODC post town names
seadatanet.description: Labels used by BODC to populate 'city' or 'post town' metadata fields.

seadatanet.name: BODC administrative region names
seadatanet.description: Labels used by BODC to populate 'county' metadata fields.

seadatanet.name: United Kingdom Charting Progress 2 sea regions
seadatanet.description: Terms used specify regions of the seas around the UK based on bio-geographical features rather than administrative boundaries

seadatanet.name: BODC series parameter collection names
seadatanet.description: Terms used by BODC to describe groups of related parameters brought together to form a series from the sample schema. Each term maps to multiple BODC parameter sets.

seadatanet.name: BODC organisation categories
seadatanet.description: Terms used by BODC to classify the organisation entities with which it deals.

seadatanet.name: BODC core failure codes
seadatanet.description: Concepts that describe sediment corer deployment operational issues.

seadatanet.name: BODC Organisation Histories
seadatanet.description: Concepts used to populate 'organisation' fields in BODC metadata schemas. When used in conjunction with the C75PK group of functions (NMNOW, NMTHEN, NMALL)they provide access to past organisation names. For example, the C75 code 'ISB' translates to 'Proudman Oceanographic Laboratory' for a date in 1995, but to 'National Oceanography Centre, Liverpool' for a date in 2015.

seadatanet.name: SeaDataNet Cruise Summary Report data categories
seadatanet.description: Terms used to describe shipboard activities (sometimes inaccurately described as parameters) by SeaDataNet in Cruise Summary Report (formerly known as ROSCOP) metadata.

seadatanet.name: SeaDataNet contact and security access roles
seadatanet.description: SeaDataNet terms to describe roles associated with access rights to data, metadata and project information or the responsibilities for a contact within an activity, project or dataset.

seadatanet.name: BODC project roles
seadatanet.description: Terms used by BODC to describe roles associated with scientific projects.

seadatanet.name: BODC asset access right roles
seadatanet.description: Terms used by BODC to describe roles specifying access rights to assets, which include data objects, web pages, services and vocabulary lists.

seadatanet.name: BODC dataset roles
seadatanet.description: Terms used by BODC for roles that describe the relationship between a person or organisation with a specific dataset.

seadatanet.name: BODC data model spatial objects
seadatanet.description: Entities in the BODC data model that may be associated with a spatial coverage in the real world

seadatanet.name: Vocabulary Server list subject categories
seadatanet.description: Terms used to classify the lists held in the Vocabulary Server (formerly known as code tables) by the subject of their contents.

seadatanet.name: DCAT Themes for Linked Data Representation of the SeaDataNet EDMED Catalogue
seadatanet.description: A vocabulary of SKOS top concepts for use as entry points to a SKOS scheme defining the DCAT theme keywords for use in linked data representations of the SeaDataNet EDMED catalogue.

seadatanet.name: ESEAS active tide gauge sites
seadatanet.description: Names of stations providing sea level data into the ESEAS network.

seadatanet.name: Processing Levels for Earth Observing System Standard Data Products
seadatanet.description:
The standard states of processed data defined by the Earth Observing System Data and Information Ssytem (EOSDIS) Data Panel, which are also consistent with the Committee on Data Management, Archiving,
and Computing (CODMAC) definitions.

seadatanet.name: SeaDataCloud Flow Cytometry Standardised Cluster Names
seadatanet.description: Terms recommended by the SeaDataCloud working group on flow cytometry data to standardise the naming and definition of clusters.

seadatanet.name: CI_DateTypeCode
seadatanet.description: Identification of when a given event occurred

seadatanet.name: CI_OnlineFunctionCode
seadatanet.description: Function performed by the resource

seadatanet.name: CI_PresentationFormCode
seadatanet.description: Mode in which the data are represented

seadatanet.name: CI_RoleCode
seadatanet.description: Function performed by the responsible party

seadatanet.name: DQ_EvaluationMethodTypeCode
seadatanet.description: Type or method for evaluating an identified data quality measure

seadatanet.name: DS_AssociationTypeCode
seadatanet.description: Justification for the correlation of two datasets

seadatanet.name: DS_InitiativeTypeCode
seadatanet.description: Type of aggregation activity in which datasets are related

seadatanet.name: MD_CellGeometryCode
seadatanet.description: Code indicating whether grid data are points or area

seadatanet.name: MD_CharacterSetCode
seadatanet.description: Name of the character coding standard used in the resource

seadatanet.name: MD_ClassificationCode
seadatanet.description: Name of the handling restrictions on the dataset

seadatanet.name: MD_CoverageContentTypeCode
seadatanet.description: Specific type of information represented in the cell

seadatanet.name: MD_DatatypeCode
seadatanet.description: Datatype of element or entity

seadatanet.name: MD_DimensionNameTypeCode
seadatanet.description: Name of the dimension

seadatanet.name: MD_GeometricObjectTypeCode
seadatanet.description: Name of point or vector objects used to locate zero-, one-, two-, or three-dimensional spatial locations in the dataset

seadatanet.name: MD_ImagingConditionCode
seadatanet.description: Code which indicates conditions which may affect the image

seadatanet.name: MD_MaintenanceFrequencyCode
seadatanet.description: Frequency with which modifications and deletions are made to the data after they are first produced

seadatanet.name: MD_MediumFormatCode
seadatanet.description: Method used to write to the medium

seadatanet.name: MD_ObligationCode
seadatanet.description: Obligation of the element or entity

seadatanet.name: MD_PixelOrientationCode
seadatanet.description: Point in a pixel corresponding to the Earth location of the pixel

seadatanet.name: MD_ProgressCode
seadatanet.description: Status of the dataset or progress of a review

seadatanet.name: MD_RestrictionCode
seadatanet.description: Limitation(s) placed upon the access or use of the data

seadatanet.name: MD_ScopeCode
seadatanet.description: Class of information to which the referencing entity applies

seadatanet.name: MD_SpatialRepresentationTypeCode
seadatanet.description:
Terms used to represent geographic information in a dataset; 
ISO codelist extracted from 'Codelists for description of metadata datasets compliant with ISO/TC 211 19115:2003 and 19139' at http://www.isotc211.org/2005/resources/Codelist/gmxCodelists.xml; last checked on 24Sep2018.

seadatanet.name: MD_TopologyLevelCode
seadatanet.description: Degree of complexity of the spatial relationships

seadatanet.name: MX_ScopeCode
seadatanet.description: Extension of MD_ScopeCode for the needs of GMX application schemas and in the context of a transfer

seadatanet.name: MD_SpatialRepresentationTypeCode (DO NOT USE - use G26 instead)
seadatanet.description: Terms used to represent geographic information in a dataset; ISO codelist extracted from 'Codelists for description of metadata datasets compliant with ISO/TC 211 19115:2003 and 19139' at http://www.isotc211.org/2005/resources/Codelist/gmxCodelists.xml. on 24Sep2018.

seadatanet.name: I18n system English (UK) language terms
seadatanet.description: System used to control text displayed on BODC web pages on dynamic applications.  The text stored in the description field is displayed in response to a CODVAL instance in the application code.

seadatanet.name: GEBCO_2019 Grid source data types
seadatanet.description: Source data type information for the data sets used in the generation of the GEBCO_2019 Grid.

seadatanet.name: GEBCO 30-second grid data sources
seadatanet.description: Provenance attributes of data source files used in the production of the GEBCO 30-second grid.

seadatanet.name: GEBCO Grid Source Data Type Identifier
seadatanet.description: Source data type information for the data sets used in the generation of the GEBCO Global Grid.

seadatanet.name: Geo-Seas features of interest
seadatanet.description: Terms used to populate the featureOfInterest name field in the Geo-Seas data object Observations and Measurments documents.

seadatanet.name: Geo-Seas observed properties
seadatanet.description: Terms used to populate the observedProperty name field in the Geo-Seas data object Observations and Measurments documents.

seadatanet.name: Geo-Seas adjusted Folk sediment lithology classes
seadatanet.description: Terms used to categorise sedimentary rocks and sediments in terms of the proportion of gravel, sand and mud.  Initial terms proposed by Folk (1954) but subsequently revised by BGS and Flemming (2000).

seadatanet.name: Geo-Seas geological sample colours
seadatanet.description: Terms used to describe rock and sediment colour in Geo-Seas based on the CGI GeologicUnitExposureColorTerms (https://www.seegrid.csiro.au/wiki/pub/CGIModel/GeologicUnitExposureColorTerms/Color.xls).

seadatanet.name: Geo-Seas sediment grain-size skewness descriptors
seadatanet.description: Terms used to describe sediment grain-size skewness coefficients in the Geo-Seas project.

seadatanet.name: Geo-Seas sediment grain-size kurtosis descriptors
seadatanet.description: Terms used to describe sediment grain-size kurtosis coefficients in the Geo-Seas project.

seadatanet.name: Geo-Seas Seismic Methods
seadatanet.description: Concepts that describe techniques used in fieldwork in the geophysical discipline of seismics

seadatanet.name: Geo-Seas Seismic Survey Dimensionality
seadatanet.description: Concepts that describe dimensionality of field surveys in the geophysical discipline of seismics

seadatanet.name: Geo-Seas Seismic Data Product Types
seadatanet.description: Concepts that describe standard types of data product produced in the geophysical discipline of seismics

seadatanet.name: Geo-Seas Seismic Receiver Types
seadatanet.description: Concepts that describe instrument types used to measure reflected and refracted acoustic signals in the geophysical discipline of seismics

seadatanet.name: MGD77 Bathymetry Sound Velocity Correction Codes
seadatanet.description: Terms used to describe sound velocity correction applied to bathymetric data in the MGD77 format

seadatanet.name: BODC I18n term usage
seadatanet.description: The purpose, such as an application, for which a given BODC I18n term in the GBX controlled vocabulary is used.

seadatanet.name: EMODnet micro-litter types
seadatanet.description: Controlled vocabulary defining the terms that may be used for micro-litter particle types (e.g. pellets, fragments, etc.) in the EMODnet Chemistry data reporting system.

seadatanet.name: EMODnet micro-litter shapes
seadatanet.description: Controlled vocabulary defining the terms that may be used for micro-litter particle shapes in the EMODnet Chemistry data reporting system.

seadatanet.name: EMODnet micro-litter size classes
seadatanet.description: Controlled vocabulary defining the terms that may be used for micro-litter particle size classes in the EMODnet Chemistry data reporting system.

seadatanet.name: EMODnet micro-litter colour classes
seadatanet.description: Controlled vocabulary defining the terms that may be used for micro-litter particle colour classes in the EMODnet Chemistry data reporting system.

seadatanet.name: EMODnet micro-litter material or polymer type
seadatanet.description: Controlled vocabulary defining the terms that may be used for micro-litter particle characterisation according to the type of non-plastic material or the type of plastic polymer in the EMODnet Chemistry data reporting system.

seadatanet.name: EMODnet micro-litter transparency classes
seadatanet.description: Controlled vocabulary defining the terms that may be used for micro-litter particle transparency categories in the EMODnet Chemistry data reporting format.

seadatanet.name: EMODnet human activity categories
seadatanet.description: Terms agreed within the EU EMODnet Human Activities community to describe categories of human activities, structures or organisational boundaries in or near the marine environment.

seadatanet.name: Subset of GRIB Table 4.2 - Parameter number by product discipline and parameter category
seadatanet.description: Extract of definitions from World Meteorological Organisation GRIB2 Table 4.2: meteorological parameter number by product discipline and parameter category.

seadatanet.name: GRIB Table 4.201 (Precipitation type)
seadatanet.description: World Meteorological Organisation GRIB2 Table 4.201: precipitation type.

seadatanet.name: Wisconsin Coastal Atlas Vocabulary
seadatanet.description: Controlled vocabulary terms used within the Wisconsin Coastal Atlas.

seadatanet.name: INSPIRE service types
seadatanet.description: Terms used in the INSPIRE infrastructure to tell a client what type of service to expect at the other end of a URL.

seadatanet.name: INSPIRE Management and Reporting Control Type
seadatanet.description: Types of control used to manage activities within a Management Area, Restriction or Regulation Zone.

seadatanet.name: INSPIRE Management and Reporting Day Type
seadatanet.description: Terms used to describe temporal periods within which an activity is scheduled to be controlled.

seadatanet.name: INSPIRE Management and Reporting Environmental Domain Area
seadatanet.description: Environmental domain area within which a Management Area, Restriction or Regulation Zone was established.

seadatanet.name: INSPIRE Management and Reporting Controlled Activity Type
seadatanet.description: Classification of the types of activities controlled within a Management Area, Restriction or Regulation Zone.

seadatanet.name: INSPIRE Management and Reporting Zone Type
seadatanet.description: High-level classification defining the type of Management Area, Restriction or Regulation Zone.

seadatanet.name: SeaDataNet Geospatial Feature Types
seadatanet.description: SeaDataNet profile of ISO MD_GeometricObjectTypeCodeTerms code list.  Known in SEA-SEARCH as 'Library 2'  or cdi_measurement_codes.

seadatanet.name: SeaDataNet Measurement Periodicity Categories
seadatanet.description: Terms used to express a classification of measurement periodicity in the SeaDataNet project.

seadatanet.name: Matrix Categories
seadatanet.description: Terms used to group features or objects (sometimes called features of interest) in which measurements or observations may be made or of which samples may be collected.

seadatanet.name: SeaDataNet device categories
seadatanet.description: Terms used to classify groups of sensors, instruments, sources of algorithmically computed data (numerical models) or samplers (collectors of water, SPM, sediment, rock, air or biota samples).

seadatanet.name: SeaVoX Platform Categories
seadatanet.description: 2-level grouping term hierarchy used for vehicles, structures or organisms capable of bearing instruments or tools for the collection of physical, chemical, geological or biological samples or data.

seadatanet.name: SeaDataNet data access mechanisms
seadatanet.description: Terms for mechanisms by which data objects described by SeaDataNet Central Data Index (CDI) records may be obtained before SeaDataNet is fully implemented.

seadatanet.name: SeaDataNet Data Access Restriction Policies
seadatanet.description: Terms used to represent and classify data access policies in operation in the SeaDataNet project.

seadatanet.name: SeaDataNet geographic co-ordinate reference frames
seadatanet.description: Co-ordinate reference systems used for positions (latitude/longitude or grid references) in SeaDataNet metadata. May include 3D co-ordinate systems, but not vertical elevation datums like OD Newlyn.

seadatanet.name: SeaDataNet depth measurement reference planes
seadatanet.description: Terms used to describe the zero point for vertical co-ordinate reference systems (datums).

seadatanet.name: SeaDataNet parameter quality control procedures
seadatanet.description: Terms that are used to describe quality control procedures applied to data parameters.

seadatanet.name: SeaVoX Vertical Co-ordinate Coverages
seadatanet.description: Terms used to describe data coverage over the vertical (z) co-ordinate.

seadatanet.name: SeaDataNet Activity Operational Stati
seadatanet.description: Terms used to describe the operational status of data collection activities within the SeaDataNet project.

seadatanet.name: SeaDataNet quality management system accreditations
seadatanet.description: Terms used to by SeaDataNet to describe formally recognised standards for data acquisition and handling procedures.

seadatanet.name: SeaDataNet Cruise Summary Report quantification units
seadatanet.description: Terms used as units in the quantification of what was collected or measured in a Cruise Summary Report (ROSCOP) record.

seadatanet.name: SeaDataNet keyword types
seadatanet.description: Terms used in SeaDataNet metadata to describe the purpose of a keyword.  An extension of the ISO19115 KeywordTypeCode codelist.

seadatanet.name: SeaDataNet measurand qualifier flags
seadatanet.description: Flags used to provide additional information, usually referring to data quality, about data values in SeaDataNet data files.

seadatanet.name: SeaDataNet device category types
seadatanet.description: High-level classification of devices based on function and mode of deployment.

seadatanet.name: SeaVoX Device Catalogue
seadatanet.description: Terms for distinct sampling or measuring devices that may be identified in the real world in terms of manufacturer and model number.

seadatanet.name: SeaDataNet metadata entities
seadatanet.description: Types of metadata record in the SeaDataNet metadata catalogue repositories

seadatanet.name: SeaDataNet data transport formats
seadatanet.description: Formats used for data delivery by SeaDataNet.

seadatanet.name: EDIOS permitted sampling interval units
seadatanet.description: Units of measure (P06 subset) that may be used for sampling intervals in the EDIOS metadata schema. Required to prevent times with units of kilograms!

seadatanet.name: SeaVoX data quality control flagging conventions
seadatanet.description: A catalogue including standardised labels of encoding schemes used for data value qualifying information such as data quality

seadatanet.name: MEDATLAS Data Centres
seadatanet.description: Organisations supplying or holding data concerned with the EU MEDATLAS project.

seadatanet.name: Geo-Seas data object quality flags
seadatanet.description: Flags representing concepts used to specify quality of Geo-Seas data objects. These are a subset of SeaDataNet measurand qualifier flags.

seadatanet.name: WMO C3 vocabulary of XBT data types
seadatanet.description: Terms specified by WMO to label XBT data with the type of probe used and the algorithm used to compute depth.

seadatanet.name: IODE Primary Level quality flags
seadatanet.description: Quality flags used for the primary level of the IODE Quality Flag Scheme for the Exchange of Oceanographic and Marine Meteorological Data, IODE Manuals and Guides 54, Vol. 3.

seadatanet.name: SenseOcean device developers and manufacturers
seadatanet.description: A collection of terms which denote the manufacturers or developers of devices (includes manufacturer and/or developer collaborations).

seadatanet.name: Marine Strategy Framework Directive descriptors 2017/848
seadatanet.description: Concepts specified as descriptors of good environmental status as defined by the Marine Strategy Framework Directive as published in Commission Decision (EU) 2017/848 of 17 May 2017 laying down criteria and methodological standards on good environmental status of marine waters and specifications and standardised methods for monitoring and assessment, and repealing Decision 2010/477/EU.

seadatanet.name: Marine Strategy Framework Directive criteria 2017/848
seadatanet.description: Concepts specified as criteria to be used to measure good environmental status as defined by the Marine Strategy Framework Directive as published in Commission Decision (EU) 2017/848 of 17 May 2017 laying down criteria and methodological standards on good environmental status of marine waters and specifications and standardised methods for monitoring and assessment, and repealing Decision 2010/477/EU.

seadatanet.name: Marine Strategy Framework Directive indicators 2017/848
seadatanet.description: Concepts specified as indicators to be used to measure good environmental status as defined by the Marine Strategy Framework Directive as published in Commission Decision (EU) 2017/848 of 17 May 2017 laying down criteria and methodological standards on good environmental status of marine waters and specifications and standardised methods for monitoring and assessment, and repealing Decision 2010/477/EU.

seadatanet.name: MEDIN data format categories
seadatanet.description: Terms describing what types of data formats exist in a data set so a human can identify if the data is likely to be of use and select a tool to interrogate that data.

seadatanet.name: The Crown Estate Renewable Energy Development Areas
seadatanet.description: Terms used to describe different areas within an offshore renewable energy development.

seadatanet.name: The Crown Estate Renewable Energy Development Phases
seadatanet.description: Terms used to describe different development phases of an offshore renewable energy development.

seadatanet.name: MEDIN socio-economic governance objective categories
seadatanet.description: Categories in a classification of the purpose and anticipated outcome of activities by governing bodies.

seadatanet.name: MEDIN monitoring activity categories
seadatanet.description: Categories in a classification of the purpose of activities in which the state of something at different times is determined.

seadatanet.name: MEDIN ecosystem valuation method types
seadatanet.description: Terms used to classify techniques used to assess the socio-economic value of an ecosystem.

seadatanet.name: MEDIN ecosystem valuation methods
seadatanet.description: Terms used to describe techniques used to assess the socio-economic value of an ecosystem.

seadatanet.name: MEDIN ecosystem service types
seadatanet.description: Terms used to classify the conditions and processes through which natural ecosystems sustain and fulfil human life.

seadatanet.name: JNCC categories of human activity in the marine environment
seadatanet.description: Categories of activity carried out by humans which exert an impact on the marine environment, as defined by the Joint Nature Conservation Committee (JNCC)

seadatanet.name: JNCC standard list of human activities in the marine environment
seadatanet.description: The standard list activities carried out by humans to manage the coastal environment, as defined by the Joint Nature Conservation Committee  (JNCC)

seadatanet.name: OSPAR list of defined pressures on the marine environment
seadatanet.description: List of defined pressures (stated by the Joint Nature Conservation Committee (JNCC) to be the mechanisms through which activities impact the marine environment) as specified by the Convention for the Protection of the Marine Environment for the North-East Atlantic (OSPAR) International Correspondence Group on Cumulative Effects (ICG-C) and distributed by the Joint Nature Conservation Committee

seadatanet.name: OSPAR list of themes of defined pressures on the marine environment
seadatanet.description: Themes under which defined pressures in M14 are categorised by the Convention for the Protection of the Marine Environment for the North-East Atlantic (OSPAR) International Correspondence Group on Cumulative Effects (ICG-C) and distributed by the Joint Nature Conservation Committee (JNCC)

seadatanet.name: Type of geotechnical investigation carried out at a site
seadatanet.description: Terms used to describe techniques used by marine engineers to investigate marine earth materials. Used in the MEDIN Geotechnical Data Guideline to categorise what type of investigations are carried out at a particular location of interest.

seadatanet.name: Type of sample collected during a geotechnical investigation
seadatanet.description: Terms used to classify types of samples collected by marine engineers during geotechnical site investigations in the marine environment.

seadatanet.name: Type of container used to hold a physical sample collected during a geotechnical site investigation
seadatanet.description: Terms used to classify types of container used by marine engineers to store physical specimens collected during marine geotechnical site investigations.

seadatanet.name: Marine Habitat Classification for Britain and Ireland Version 04.05
seadatanet.description: Version 04.05 of the Marine Habitat Classification for Britain and Ireland (Connor et al. 2004), a hierarchical standard list of seabed habitats occurring within the marine, coastal and estuarine waters of Britain and Ireland. Connor, D.W., J.H. Allen, N.Golding, K.L.Howell, L.M. Lieberknecht, K.O. Northen And J.B. Reker (2004) The Marine Habitat Classification for Britain and Ireland Version 04.05. ISBN 1 861 07561 8.

seadatanet.name: Marine Habitat Classification for Britain and Ireland Version 15.03
seadatanet.description: Version 15.03 of the Marine Habitat Classification for Britain and Ireland (JNCC 2015), a hierarchical standard list of seabed habitats occurring within the marine, coastal and estuarine waters of Britain and Ireland. JNCC (2015) The Marine Habitat Classification for Britain and Ireland Version 15.03 [Online].

seadatanet.name: OSPAR List of Threatened and/or Declining Species and Habitats
seadatanet.description: List of species and habitats that are considered to be priorities for protection by the OSPAR Commission (see https://www.ospar.org/work-areas/bdc/species-habitats/list-of-threatened-declining-species-habitats)

seadatanet.name: HELCOM 'HUB' Underwater Biotope and Habitat Classification System
seadatanet.description: The HELCOM Underwater biotope and habitat classification system (HELCOM HUB) provides a framework for defining biotopes in the whole Baltic Sea. Defining biotopes by the same split-rules, enables comparison of the biotopes in different regions of the Baltic Sea (see http://www.helcom.fi/baltic-sea-trends/biodiversity/helcom-hub).

seadatanet.name: Marine Habitat Classification for Britain and Ireland Version 97.06
seadatanet.description: Version 97.07 of the Marine Habitat Classification for Britain and Ireland (Connor et al, 1997), a hierarchical standard list of seabed habitats occurring within the marine, coastal and estuarine waters of Britain and Ireland. Volume 1 (JNCC Report No 229) and Volume 2 (JNCC Report No 230).

seadatanet.name: Geospatial discovery metadata standards, specifications and profiles recognised by MEDIN
seadatanet.description: Terms that define standards recognised by MEDIN as being used to generate metadata records with the aim of enabling the discovery of geospatial data through online resources such as portals. Standard in this definition also covers specifications and profiles. Terms include both international and UK standards.

seadatanet.name: The Crown Estate Seabed Development Phases
seadatanet.description: Terms used to describe different phases within an offshore development or seabed activity.

seadatanet.name: The Crown Estate Seabed Development Areas
seadatanet.description: Terms used to describe different areas within an offshore development or seabed activity site.

seadatanet.name: Movebank Attribute Dictionary
seadatanet.description: Terms used to describe on-animal sensor data stored in the Movebank database (movebank.org), including individual measurements (events), reference data (animals, tags, deployments) and studies.

seadatanet.name: MEDIN metadata record availability
seadatanet.description: Terms used to describe portals to which a MEDIN discovery metadata record carrying the keyword should be made available.

seadatanet.name: NERC DataGrid Recognised Formats
seadatanet.description: Formats recognised by NDG, where this may allow conditional treatment. See also http://proj.badc.rl.ac.uk/ndg/browser/TI07-MOLES/trunk/Documents/NDG_MOLES_Instructions_for_Creation.doc

seadatanet.name: Climate Science Modelling Language supported feature types
seadatanet.description: Terms used to specify the feature types available for coverages in the Climate Science Modelling Language (CSML).

seadatanet.name: NERC DataGrid on-line reference types
seadatanet.description: Terms describing types of on-line references in NERC DataGrid service bindings

seadatanet.name: NERC data discovery service input metadata document standards
seadatanet.description: Terms used to describe the standard, profile and version number of XML documents that may be uploaded to the NERC DDS.

seadatanet.name: NERC Environmental Data Centres DataCite General Resource Types
seadatanet.description:
Controlled list of terms used by the NERC Environmnetal Data Centres for submission of DOI metadata records to DataCite. The list is used to populate 
http://purl.org/spar/datacite/hasGeneralResourceType from the EDC's GEMINI profiles.

seadatanet.name: ODATIS aggregation parameters and Essential Variable names
seadatanet.description: Collection of terms used within the French Ocean Data and Services Cluster ODATIS for data discovery and product or dataset aggregation. Whenever applicable, Essential Variable terms are linked to the authoritative source of Essential Climate Ocean and Biodiversity Variable definitions maintained by the Global Observing System for Climate (GCOS), the Global Ocean Observing System (GOOS) and the Group on Earth Observations Biodiversity Observation Network (GEO BON).

seadatanet.name: Ocean Glider Network Parameter Usage Vocabulary
seadatanet.description: Terms under the content governance of the Ocean Glider Data Management Task Team on behalf of the Ocean Glider Network (OGN) and Everyone's Gliding Observatories (EGO) used to describe measured phenomena within the OGN/EGO format.

seadatanet.name: BODC Parameter Usage Vocabulary
seadatanet.description: Terms built using the BODC parameter semantic model designed to describe individual measured phenomena. May be used to mark up sets of data such as a NetCDF array or spreadsheet column.

seadatanet.name: SeaDataNet Parameter Discovery Vocabulary
seadatanet.description: Terms describing fine-grained related groups of measurement phenomena designed to be used in dataset discovery interfaces.

seadatanet.name: SeaDataNet Agreed Parameter Groups
seadatanet.description: Terms agreed within the EU SeaDataNet community to describe coarse-grained groupings of related measurement phenomena.

seadatanet.name: Global Change Master Directory Science Keywords V5
seadatanet.description: Concatenated category, topic, term and variable separated by '>'. From Olsen L.M. et. al (2006) NASA/GCMD Earth Science Keywords Version 5.3.3.

seadatanet.name: International Standards Organisation ISO19115 Topic Categories
seadatanet.description: Terms defined by ISO describing data themes.  Used to populate the mandatory ISO19115 topic category field.

seadatanet.name: BODC-approved data storage units
seadatanet.description: Terms approved for use by BODC to describe the measurement units for data held in its repositories.

seadatanet.name: Climate and Forecast Standard Names
seadatanet.description: Terms used for definitive but not necessarily comprehensive descriptions of measured phenomena in the CF conventions (a content standard for data stored in NetCDF).

seadatanet.name: SeaDataNet Parameter Disciplines
seadatanet.description: Terms used to classify SeaDataNet Agreed Parameter Groups to provide topic/theme level terms in a hierarchical parameter discovery interface.

seadatanet.name: MEDATLAS Parameter Usage Vocabulary
seadatanet.description: Terms under the content governance of SISMER used to describe measured phenomena within the MEDATLAS project.

seadatanet.name: Global Change Master Directory Instrument Keywords
seadatanet.description: Terms used to describe sensors, instruments and other pieces of scientific equipment in the NASA Global Change Master Directory metadatabase.

seadatanet.name: Global Change Master Directory Science Keyword categories
seadatanet.description: Category level terms from the Science Keywords from Olsen L.M. et. al (2006) NASA/GCMD Earth Science Keywords Version 5.3.3.

seadatanet.name: Global Change Master Directory Science Keyword topics
seadatanet.description: Topic level terms from the Science Keywords from Olsen L.M. et. al (2006) NASA/GCMD Earth Science Keywords Version 5.3.3.

seadatanet.name: Global Change Master Directory Science Keyword terms
seadatanet.description: Term level terms from the Science Keywords from Olsen L.M. et. al (2006) NASA/GCMD Earth Science Keywords Version 5.3.3.

seadatanet.name: Global Change Master Directory Science Keyword variables
seadatanet.description: Variable level terms from the Science Keywords from Olsen L.M. et. al (2006) NASA/GCMD Earth Science Keywords Version 5.3.3.

seadatanet.name: Climate and Forecast Cell Methods
seadatanet.description: Terms used to describe measured phenomena derivation algorithms in the CF conventions (a content standard for data stored in NetCDF), primarily targeted at statistical parameters.

seadatanet.name: Partnership for Observation of the Global Ocean ships of interest
seadatanet.description: Research vessels deemed to be of interest to POGO.  'Of interest' is defined as active ocean-going research vessels greater than 60m in length

seadatanet.name: Global Change Master Directory Chronostratigraphic Units
seadatanet.description: Chronostratigraphic unit terms from Olsen L.M. et. al (2006) NASA/GCMD Earth Science Keywords Version 5.3.3.

seadatanet.name: Global Change Master Directory platforms
seadatanet.description: Terms used to describe sensor-bearing platforms from Olsen L.M. et. al (2006) NASA/GCMD Earth Science Keywords Version 5.3.3.

seadatanet.name: Global Change Master Directory URL content types
seadatanet.description: Terms used in NASA's GCMD to describe the function of related URLs embedded in DIF metadata records.  Also used for NERC DataGrid service bindings.

seadatanet.name: Marisaurus Thesaurus
seadatanet.description: Base terms (all hierarchical levels) interlinked by a relationship network to build the Marisaurus thesaurus.

seadatanet.name: GEMET - INSPIRE themes, version 1.0
seadatanet.description: Groupings of spatial data according to Annex I, II and III of the INSPIRE Directive [DS-D2.5]

seadatanet.name: MEDIN Parameter Discipline Keywords
seadatanet.description: Coarse grained grouping terms designed by MEDIN to provide the top level for a parameter discovery thesaurus.

seadatanet.name: Units of measure dimensions
seadatanet.description: Classification concepts for units of measure based upon the fundamental SI quantities upon which they are based.

seadatanet.name: NETMAR aggregation parameters
seadatanet.description: Terms used to describe phenomena within the NETMAR project at a granularity level suitable for labelling data aggregations or assessing whether the parameter is appropriate as an input to a given WPS.

seadatanet.name: ISO19119 geographic services taxonomy
seadatanet.description: A collection of categories and sub-categories developed by ISO to classify services that display or process spatial data

seadatanet.name: Oil spill spillet location
seadatanet.description: Terms used to describe the environmental spatial location of an aliquot of a simulated oil spill by the METEO France MOTHY model.

seadatanet.name: Cedre pollution site cleanup operational stati
seadatanet.description: Terms used to describe the operational stati of pollution cleanup sites in the Cedre cleanup site service.

seadatanet.name: Climate and Forecast Area Types
seadatanet.description: Terms used to describe the characteristics of regions of the Earth's Surface or their representation in a numerical simulation in the CF metadata conventions for data stored in NetCDF.

seadatanet.name: Climate and Forecast Standardized Region Names
seadatanet.description: Terms used to label regions of the Earth's Surface or their representation in a numerical simulation in the CF metadata conventions for data stored in NetCDF.

seadatanet.name: EMODnet Chemistry aggregated parameter names
seadatanet.description: Labels used for aggregated parameters in the EMODNET chemistry lot

seadatanet.name: EMODnet Chemistry chemical groups
seadatanet.description: Terms based on the EU MSFD used by the EMODNET chemistry lot to provide coarse granularity groupings of the chemical parameters it covers.

seadatanet.name: Climate and Forecast Calendars
seadatanet.description: Terms used by the CF community to describe the calendar systems used for time co-ordinates in CF-compliant data files

seadatanet.name: Climate and Forecast Vertical Co-ordinate Coverages
seadatanet.description: Terms used by the CF community to describe the data coverage over the vertical (z) co-ordinate. This is used to describe the Earth Realm in the CF Standard Name semantic model.

seadatanet.name: Global Change Master Directory Science Keywords V6
seadatanet.description: Concatenated category, topic, term and variable separated by '>'. From Olsen L.M. et. al (2007) NASA/GCMD Earth Science Keywords Version 6.0.0.0

seadatanet.name: OBIS sampling instruments and methods attributes
seadatanet.description: Collection of terms used by the Ocean Biogeographic Information System to standardise attributes related to sampling instruments and methods.

seadatanet.name: Argo data type
seadatanet.description: Terms describing the type of data contained in an Argo netCDF file.

seadatanet.name: Argo parameter codes
seadatanet.description: Terms describing individual measured phenomena, used to mark up sets of data in Argo NetCDF arrays

seadatanet.name: Argo data centres and institutions
seadatanet.description: Codes for data centres and institutions handling or managing Argo data.

seadatanet.name: Argo position accuracy
seadatanet.description: Accuracy in latitude and longitude measurements received from the positioning system, grouped by location accuracy classes.

seadatanet.name: Argo data state indicators
seadatanet.description: Processing stage of the data based on the concatenation of processing level and class indicators.

seadatanet.name: Argo history action codes
seadatanet.description: Coded history information for each action performed on each profile by a data centre.

seadatanet.name: Argo instrument types
seadatanet.description: Subset of instrument type codes from the World Meteorological Organization (WMO) table 1770.

seadatanet.name: Argo positioning system
seadatanet.description: Name of the system in charge of measuring the float locations.

seadatanet.name: Argo transmission systems
seadatanet.description: Names of the telecommunication systems.

seadatanet.name: Argo real-time quality-control test identifiers
seadatanet.description: List of real-time quality-control tests and corresponding binary identifiers, used as reference to populate the HISTORY_QCTEST field.

seadatanet.name: Argo history processing step codes
seadatanet.description: Data processing step codes for history record.

seadatanet.name: Argo ocean area codes and boundary definitions
seadatanet.description: Ocean area codes assigned to each profile in the profile directory file located at the root of the GDACs ftp servers.

seadatanet.name: Argo trajectory measurement code identifiers
seadatanet.description: Measurement code IDs used in Argo trajectory NetCDF files

seadatanet.name: Argo vertical sampling schemes
seadatanet.description: Profile sampling schemes and sampling methods

seadatanet.name: Argo STATUS flags
seadatanet.description: Flag scale for values in all _STATUS fields

seadatanet.name: Argo GROUNDED flags
seadatanet.description: Codes to indicate the best estimate of whether the float touched the ground during a specific cycle

seadatanet.name: Argo status flag on the Representative Park Pressure (RPP)
seadatanet.description: Status flag on the Representative Park Pressure (RPP)

seadatanet.name: Argo platform family
seadatanet.description: Platform family/category of instrument

seadatanet.name: Argo platform type
seadatanet.description: Platform type

seadatanet.name: Argo platform maker
seadatanet.description: Name of the platform manufacturer

seadatanet.name: Argo sensor types
seadatanet.description: Terms describing sensor types in Argo NetCDF arrays

seadatanet.name: Argo sensor manufacturers
seadatanet.description: Terms describing sensor developers and manufacturers in Argo NetCDF arrays

seadatanet.name: Argo sensor models
seadatanet.description: Terms describing sensor models in Argo NetCDF arrays

seadatanet.name: Argo delayed-mode quality control measurement flags
seadatanet.description: Quality flag scale for delayed mode measurements.

seadatanet.name: Argo measurement code categories
seadatanet.description: Categories of trajectory measurement codes listed in NVS collection 'R15'

seadatanet.name: Argo profile quality control flags
seadatanet.description: Quality control flag scale for whole profiles.

seadatanet.name: Argo real-time quality control measurement flags
seadatanet.description: Quality flag scale for real-time measurements.

seadatanet.name: Argo float cycle timing variables
seadatanet.description: Timing variables representing stages of an Argo float profiling cycle, most of which are associated with a trajectory measurement code ID listed in NVS collection 'R15'

seadatanet.name: BODC parameter semantic model component names
seadatanet.description: Terms used to describe the information entities that are combined in the BODC semantic model to produce a phenomenon description.

seadatanet.name: BODC parameter semantic model relationships between what theme and where theme
seadatanet.description: Terms used to describe the relationship between the 'where theme' and the 'what theme' in the BODC semantic model for measured phenomena descriptions.

seadatanet.name: BODC parameter semantic model sample preparation entity descriptions
seadatanet.description: Controlled vocabulary defining the terms that may be used for a sample preparation entity (part of the how theme) in the BODC parameter semantic model.

seadatanet.name: BODC parameter semantic model analytical method entity descriptions
seadatanet.description: Controlled vocabulary defining the terms that may be used for an analytical method entity (part of the how theme) in the BODC parameter semantic model.

seadatanet.name: BODC parameter semantic model data processing entity descriptions
seadatanet.description: Controlled vocabulary defining the terms that may be used for data processing description (part of the how theme) in the BODC parameter semantic model.

seadatanet.name: BODC parameter semantic model parameter entity names
seadatanet.description: Controlled vocabulary defining the terms that may be used to specify the property element of a parameter (part of the 'what' theme) in the BODC parameter semantic model.

seadatanet.name: BODC parameter semantic model parameter statistic
seadatanet.description: Controlled vocabulary defining the terms that may be used for a parameter statistic (part of the what theme) in the BODC parameter semantic model.

seadatanet.name: BODC parameter semantic model biological entity size terms
seadatanet.description: Controlled vocabulary defining the terms that may be used for biological entity size (part of the what theme) in the BODC parameter semantic model.

seadatanet.name: BODC parameter semantic model biological entity sex category terms
seadatanet.description: Controlled vocabulary defining terms used to refer to a biological entity sex category (part of the what theme) in the BODC parameter semantic model.

seadatanet.name: BODC parameter semantic model biological entity development stage terms
seadatanet.description: Controlled vocabulary defining the terms that may be used to specify the development or life cycle stage of a biological entity (part of the 'what' theme) in the BODC parameter semantic model.

seadatanet.name: BODC parameter semantic model biological entity subcomponent terms
seadatanet.description: Controlled vocabulary defining the terms that may be used for biological entity (component of the what theme) plant or animal parts in the BODC parameter semantic model.

seadatanet.name: BODC parameter semantic model biological entity subgroup terms
seadatanet.description: Controlled vocabulary defining the terms that may be used for ad-hoc qualification of a biological entity (component of the what theme)  in the BODC parameter semantic model.

seadatanet.name: BODC parameter semantic model biological entity morphology terms
seadatanet.description: Controlled vocabulary defining the terms that may be used for morphology of a biological entity (component of the what theme)  in the BODC parameter semantic model.

seadatanet.name: BODC parameter semantic model biological entity colour terms
seadatanet.description: Controlled vocabulary defining the terms that may be used for colour or optical appearance of a biological entity (component of the what theme)  in the BODC parameter semantic model.

seadatanet.name: BODC parameter semantic model physical entity names
seadatanet.description: Controlled vocabulary defining the terms that may be used for a physical entity (part of the what theme) in the BODC parameter semantic model.

seadatanet.name: BODC parameter semantic model physical entity subgroup names
seadatanet.description: Controlled vocabulary defining the terms that may be used to qualify a generic physical entity (part of the what theme) in the BODC parameter semantic model.

seadatanet.name: BODC parameter semantic model physical entity datum names
seadatanet.description: Controlled vocabulary defining the terms that may be used to describe the reference with respect to which a physical entity (part of the what theme) in the BODC parameter. semantic model is specified.

seadatanet.name: BODC parameter semantic model sphere names
seadatanet.description: Controlled vocabulary defining the terms that may be used to describe the sphere (SWEET EarthRealm) in the BODC parameter semantic model. Part of the where theme.

seadatanet.name: BODC parameter semantic model sphere subgroup names
seadatanet.description: Controlled vocabulary defining the terms that may be used to describe subgroupings of the sphere (SWEET EarthRealm) in the BODC parameter semantic model. Part of the where theme.

seadatanet.name: BODC semantic model sphere phase names
seadatanet.description: Controlled vocabulary defining the terms for phase (dissolved, particulate etc.) within a sphere (SWEET EarthRealm) in the BODC parameter semantic model. Part of the where theme.

seadatanet.name: BODC semantic model sphere phase subgroup names
seadatanet.description: Concepts describing physical or logical (i.e. categories) subdivisions of a phase (i.e. subcomponent) of a sphere (SWEET EarthRealm) in the BODC parameter semantic model. Part of the where theme.

seadatanet.name: BODC parameter semantic model biological entity names
seadatanet.description: Terms used to describe biological entities (organisms or parts thereof) in the BODC Parameter Usage Vocabulary

seadatanet.name: BODC parameter semantic model matrices
seadatanet.description: Terms used to describe the medium in which a measurement was made in the semantic model that underpins the BODC parameter discovery vocabulary

seadatanet.name: BODC parameter semantic model chemical substances
seadatanet.description: Terms for chemicals whose quantity in a matrix is determined to generate measurements in the BODC parameter usage vocabulary semantic model. Includes elements, compounds, isotopes and mixtures.

seadatanet.name: Seaglider Guidance and Control Phase Settings
seadatanet.description: The six encoded modes of operation for a deployed Seaglider.

seadatanet.name: BODC parameter semantic model physical entity compound names
seadatanet.description: Terms used to describe physical entities in the BODC Parameter Usage Vocabulary

seadatanet.name: BODC parameter semantic model relationships between biological entities
seadatanet.description: Controlled vocabulary defining the relationship between two biological entities in the BODC parameter semantic model for biological parameters related to e.g. predator-prey interactions.

seadatanet.name: British Antarctic Survey research topics
seadatanet.description: Standardised list of major research areas within the British Antarctic Survey for classifying materials and activities.

seadatanet.name: British Antarctic Survey data catalogue collections
seadatanet.description: Labels used to group items within the BAS data catalogue by a shared purpose, theme, event or some other criteria.

seadatanet.name: SeaDataNet Vocabularies
seadatanet.description: Controlled vocabularies deemed to be of interest to the SeaDataNet project or users of its standards

seadatanet.name: SeaDataNet CDI/CSR ISO Code List collections
seadatanet.description: Concept collections used within ISO Code List representations for ISO19139 encoding of SeaDataNet CDIs and CSRs

seadatanet.name: SeaDataNet GMX and imported ISO Code List collections
seadatanet.description: Concept collections used within ISOTC211/19115 namespace of ISO Code List representations for ISO19139 encoding of SeaDataNet CDIs and CSRs

seadatanet.name: SeaDataNet Sensor Web Enablement and SensorML type vocabulary
seadatanet.description: Vocabulary in support of SeaDataNet's implementation of OGC Sensor Web Enablement. This is the top level vocabulary with many narrower concepts from other vocabularies.

seadatanet.name: SeaDataNet Sensor Web Enablement and SensorML sub-type vocabulary
seadatanet.description: Vocabulary in support of SeaDataNet's (SDN) implementation of OGC Sensor Web Enablement (SWE). This is the lower level SDN SEW specific vocabulary.

seadatanet.name: SensorML History Event Types
seadatanet.description: Terms used to describe events or operations that have taken place during the life of an observation system (e.g. a sensor, a platform, an instrument, a network).

seadatanet.name: SensorML Capability Section Terms
seadatanet.description: Terms used in SensorML to describe properties of an observation system that further qualify or quantify its output values.

seadatanet.name: SensorML Characteristic Section Terms
seadatanet.description: Terms used in SensorML to describe properties of an observation system that do not further qualify or quantify its output values.

seadatanet.name: SensorML Classification Section Terms
seadatanet.description: Terms used in SensorML to describe aspects of an observation system (e.g. the type of process, the type of sensor, or its intended applications).

seadatanet.name: SensorML Identification Section Terms
seadatanet.description: Terms used in SensorML to identify an observation system.

seadatanet.name: SensorML Contact Section Terms
seadatanet.description: Terms used in SensorML to describe the role and contact information for an observation system.

seadatanet.name: Sensor Web Enablement Observations and Measurements Section Terms
seadatanet.description: Terms used in SWE Observations and Measurements that describe the measurements made by an observing system and the features involved in this process.

seadatanet.name: SensorML Output Section Data Interface Terms
seadatanet.description: Terms used in SensorML to describe the software interactions with an observing system. The terms are typically used in the SensorML Outputs section.

seadatanet.name: SensorML Event Classification Terms
seadatanet.description: Terms used in SensorML to describe aspects of an Event.
